displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of Light that continuously heals those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Healing Rift

displayProperties.description: Conjure a well of Light that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
displayProperties.name: Empowering Rift

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
displayProperties.name: Strafe Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
displayProperties.name: Burst Glide

displayProperties.description: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.
displayProperties.name: Balanced Glide

displayProperties.description: A grenade that calls down a focused lightning storm.
displayProperties.name: Storm Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Arcbolt Grenade

displayProperties.description: A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.
displayProperties.name: Pulse Grenade

displayProperties.description: Chain Arc Lightning from your hands and electrify enemies with devastating streams of Arc Light that intensify over time.
displayProperties.name: Stormtrance

displayProperties.description: This electrocuting Melee ability chains lightning from the struck target to nearby enemies.
displayProperties.name: Chain Lightning

displayProperties.description: When cast with full grenade and melee energy, Stormtrance lasts longer and fully restores Health.
displayProperties.name: Transcendence

displayProperties.description: Enemies damaged by your Grenades  chain deadly lightning to nearby enemies. Each grenade or melee chain returns grenade energy.
displayProperties.name: Arc Web

displayProperties.description: Activate to teleport during Stormtrance.
displayProperties.name: Ionic Blink

displayProperties.description: This electrocuting melee ability recharges your Super, grenade, and melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Rising Storm

displayProperties.description: On casting Stormtrance, fire a bolt of lightning into the ground, creating a devastating shockwave under you.
displayProperties.name: Landfall

displayProperties.description: Your Rift lasts longer. It charges faster when allies are near.
displayProperties.name: Electrostatic Surge

displayProperties.description: Your Rift now grants you or any ally that uses it an Arc Soul to aid in battle.
displayProperties.name: Arc Soul

displayProperties.description: Unleash a long-range channeled beam of concentrated Arc energy. While active, press  to deactivate Chaos Reach early and save Super energy.
displayProperties.name: Chaos Reach

displayProperties.description: Fire an Arc projectile that travels forward and releases a perpendicular bolt of lightning.
displayProperties.name: Ball Lightning

displayProperties.description: Defeating enemies has a chance to create Ionic Traces. Collecting Ionic Traces grants energy to all your abilities.
displayProperties.name: Ionic Trace

displayProperties.description: Being critically wounded triggers an energy wave that boosts yours and allies' speed.
displayProperties.name: Pulsewave
